code:
---
title: MiGrid Product Roadmap Timeline
---
gantt
    dateFormat  YYYY-MM-DD
    
    section Phase 1: Foundation
    v1.0.0 Genesis Release        :done, p1a, 2025-01-01, 2025-01-31
    v1.1.0 Admin Portal Alpha     :done, p1b, 2025-02-01, 2025-02-28
    
    section Phase 2: Grid Integration
    v2.0.0 Grid Signal Release    :active, p2a, 2025-04-01, 2025-04-30
    v2.1.0 Telematics Bridge      :p2b, 2025-05-01, 2025-05-31
    
    section Phase 3: Market Access
    v3.0.0 VPP Aggregator         :p3a, 2025-07-01, 2025-07-31
    v3.1.0 Market Gateway Alpha   :p3b, 2025-08-01, 2025-08-31
    
    section Phase 4: Driver Experience
    v4.0.0 Driver App Launch      :p4a, 2025-10-01, 2025-10-31
    v4.1.0 Reward Ecosystem       :p4b, 2025-11-01, 2025-11-30
    
    section Phase 5: Enterprise Scale
    v5.0.0 Enterprise Platform    :p5a, 2026-01-01, 2026-01-31
    v5.1.0 Global Markets         :p5b, 2026-03-01, 2026-03-31

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 然后，流程会走到 主架构。
